page.title: 09HOUSING 2
page.content: This page deals with people's housing preferences. {Q8.DO YOU PREFER YOUR PRESENT HOUSE ? {Yes}140;{Why?}_ more rooms 49; garden 24; detached 13; better area 13; more modern 12; warmer 3; good neighbours 2; better local services 13; move from flat to house 7; sunny outlook 3; far away from my sister's house 1. { {No}9;{Why?}_ Rates too high 1; no garden 2; smaller 3; dislike area 1; old house had more character 2. {Q9.REASONS FOR MOVING}_ Needed bigger house 38; needed smaller house 9; to have garden 5; husband's work 11; returned from abroad 6; marriage 5; better area 4; widowed 3; wanted to buy house 3; wanted garage space 2; last house damp 2; last house demolished 7; better catchment area for schools 1.
